item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0275; 06:25AM; 1227 W King Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zKGbDb; Vermont Square; KNOCKDOWN: 31 firefighters extinguished the fire in 24 minutes with no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E15 E226 E266 E34 E46 RA46 RA66 T26 T66; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0275; 06:01AM; 1227 W King Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zKGbDb; Vermont Square; Two story, four-plex with fire showing in one unit. Additional resources requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E15 E226 E266 E34 E46 RA46 RA66 T26 T66; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0039; 01:04AM; 1578 E 21st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3f7p7xT; Central-Alameda; 37 Firefighters took 22 minutes in a well-coordinated offensive fire attack that contained the bulk of fire to a well involved 'bus type' (?) vehicle and other property to the rear of a 1 story home. No injury. Fire cause under investigation; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 E10 E14 E210 E9 RA14 RA17 SQ21 T10 T9; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0039; 12:42AM; 1578 E 21st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3f7p7xT; Central-Alameda; PRELIM: Truck heavily involved with fire to the rear of a 1 story home, with flames threatening the residence; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 E10 E14 E210 RA14 RA17 SQ21 T10; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1627; 09:08PM; 13305 W Arminta St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3f6dEyv; #SunValley; 46 Firefighters took just 30 minutes to extinguish heavy fire in a 2,147 square-foot one-story home. All four occupants exited the structure safely prior to LAFD arrival. No injury. Fire cause under investigation; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 CM42 E102 E239 E260 E289 E290 E39 E77 EM14 RA39 RA889 T39 T60 T89 T90; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1627; 08:38PM; 13305 W Arminta St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3f6dEyv; #SunValley; PRELIM: One story home with heavy fire showing; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 CM42 E102 E239 E260 E289 E290 E39 E77 EM14 RA39 RA889 T39 T60 T89 T90; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1151; 03:47PM; 17700 W Roscoe Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3f85MwA; #Reseda; PRELIM: Traffic collision with entrapment of at least one patient (and another pedestrian injured?). No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #2326); FS 103; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E103 E290 EM15 RA100 RA73 RA881 T90; CH8; 18; Brian Humphrey

#Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1120; 03:45PM; 1605 S Canfield Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GeUN04; #Beverlywood; Address corrected from 1606 S Canfield Avenue and neighborhood name to adjacent 'Beverlywood'. First arriving 24 LAFD Firefighters took just 16 minutes to confine flames to a detached structure in the rear yard, now described as a pool house conversion. No injury. Fire cause under investigation; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E292 E58 E59 E71 RA58 T92; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1120; 03:29PM; 1606 S Canfield Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HLr53e; #PicoRobertson; PRELIM: Detached garage (conversion?) well involved with fire; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E292 E58 E59 E71 RA58 T92; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Update Aircraft Down; INC#0965; 02:30PM; 10130 N San Fernando Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HRYOIb; #Pacoima; The pilot (unknown age / gender / injuries/ condition / affiliation / circumstances) has been transported to a regional trauma center by LAFD Paramedics. No fire. Minor fuel spill has been contained by firefighters. No other injuries reported. The damaged airplane remains on or near Metrolink Antelope Valley line train tracks. All train movement is currently restricted in that area. No further details. #LATraffic: Closure of one or more lanes of San Fernando Road and/or Osborne Street in the immediate area until on-site emergency / investigative operations are complete, unknown duration. Motorists, expect congestion and delay, avoid the area and consider an alternate route. Detours are readily available. Monitor traffic reports on news radio. Train Riders: Follow @MetrolinkAV https://twitter.com/MetrolinkAV on Twitter for any service related information. Media Inquiries: NTSB / FAA; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E7 EM15 EM17 HR3 RA898 RA98 T75 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey
